name: play
description: a REST-based Tic-Tac-Toe service at http://yourserver/ttt/play that takes as input a JSON object including a ‘grid’ property and returns a JSON object including a ‘grid’ property and a ‘winner’ property. The ‘grid’ property is an array of 9 characters, each being a space (‘ ‘), ‘X’, or ‘O’. The ‘winner’ property is a single character to indicate who won.
author: Tayo Amuneke
